tool_description: Calculates the distance between two geographical coordinates.

api_list.name: calc
api_list.description: Calculate distance between two coordinates based on their longitude and latitude.

required_parameters.name: startLongitude
required_parameters.description: The longitude of the starting point.

required_parameters.name: startLatitude
required_parameters.description: The latitude of the starting point.

required_parameters.name: endLongitude
required_parameters.description: The longitude of the destination point.

required_parameters.name: endLatitude
required_parameters.description: The latitude of the destination point.
